name: Defenders of the Source
description:
Use your galactic resources to defend The Source from hordes of aliens!

Features:

  • 3 distinct levels
  • 2 unique protagonist abilities
  • 3 spawnable defenses
  • 5 alien types

Credits

Designed by Nicole Havin and Mac Coulter.

Artwork by Ian Castorillo.

Music/SFX by Guidian Shturman Waiss, Collin Lewis, Sean Morrow, Christian Lee, Ananta Arora, Markel Badallo Latorre, and Remi Chandler.
